Description.0: The ship was designed in conjunction with the Osmium Star Class as a compact and powerful heavy cruiser.
Description.1: Intended for escort roles these ships were faster and smaller than most other heavy cruisers and even their design contempries.
Description.2: The first of the class wasn't launched until the third generation where this type of ship became needed.
Description.3: It is the second most commen star class ship ever.
